Description: The default-github threat model shares multiple threats with other models in the organization, particularly in web application vulnerabilities.
Several mitigation strategies identified in the default-github model are applicable to other threat models, enhancing overall security effectiveness.
The attack patterns identified in the default-github model are consistent with those observed in industry benchmarks, indicating common vulnerabilities.

Source: A high frequency of web application vulnerabilities such as XSS and SQL Injection across multiple threat models.
Many applications fail to implement adequate input validation, leading to various injection attacks.
